maintenance.soil: Loose, fertile, and well-drained loam soil, pH value between 6-6.5
maintenance.watering: Like moist very much, especially during flowering and fruiting time
maintenance.fertilization: Like fertilizer very much, apply more fertilizer during growing and fruiting period
maintenance.pruning: Remove flower stem, diseased and rotten leaves timely and harvest tender melons about 20 days after flowering
